relatedRecords.name: Girls In Tech Summit
relatedRecords.description: The Girls in Tech Summit is a celebration of TechGirlz’s 10th Anniversary with talks on technology given by girls, for girls. relatedRecords.name: CFS  - Spring 2020 Reston Azure DataFest: Big Data & Analytics Conference
relatedRecords.description:
Hello Everyone!
We are pleased to announce that registration is open for “Spring 2020 Reston Azure DataFest”, a 1-day event on Friday, April 17, 2020, 9:00AM to 5:00PM at the Microsoft offices at 12012 Sunset Hills Road, Reston,VA., 20190. We will be in Rooms 3028, 3054, 3058, and 3062.
